text: ~That reads to me like "web_technologies" is coming is a null, and the type does not allow that.~
try removing the "!" from where you are typing the variable $web_technologies.
That is is preventing null values from being allowed ... I have to assume that the variable is evaluating to null in some case.
If I remove “!”, that is not filtered at all and I just get all CRM objects.
Which tracks with that value being null.
but module.web_technologies has a untouched default value of [“salesforce”] see my example above
